publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3692.1 Tommy Sheridan: Fire in the Old Town, Edinburgh-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3692) in the name of Sarah Boyack, insert at end ", and further believes that tragic incidents like these illustrate clearly the justice of the firefighters' pay claim and the need for proper night cover at all times to ensure adequate response times and action to save lives."

S1M-3692.1 Tommy Sheridan: Fire in the Old Town, Edinburgh-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3692) in the name of Sarah Boyack, insert at end ", and further believes that tragic incidents like these illustrate clearly the justice of the firefighters' pay claim and the need for proper night cover at all times to ensure adequate response times and action to save lives."
S1M-3692.1 Fire in the Old Town, Edinburgh (lodged on 10 December 2002) Linda Fabiani*

S1M-3692.1 Tommy Sheridan: Fire in the Old Town, Edinburgh—As an amendment to motion (S1M-3692) in the name of Sarah Boyack, insert at end ", and further believes that tragic incidents like these illustrate clearly the justice of the firefighters’ pay claim and the need for proper night cover at all times to ensure adequate response times and action to save lives." Supported by: Linda Fabiani
